topic.title: Displaying Multiple References to the Same Topics

body.p: Whenever multiple references to the same topic are detected in the context of the current map in the DITA Maps Manager, an indicator will appear in the top-right corner of the Author mode editor that shows the number of times the current topic is referenced in the DITA map. It also includes navigation arrows that allow you to jump to the next or previous reference in the DITA Maps Manager.
